TopicTitle: How is organized KSP Folder with add on in .20 on OSX

Articles.Content:
Hi

My game .20 is running perfectly but I am not sure My KSP folder is well organized. When I read the new parts loading system .20 about add on on different threads, it looks like a big mess.

So, does somebody knows what we are suppose to do with all the add on folders

There are about six kind of folders:

-Parts

-Ships >SPH

>VAB

PluginData > folder name > name.cfg

Plugins > name.dII

Source > alot of folders > name.cs

Saves > scenarios >name.sfs

>training >name.sfs

My KSP folder .20 is the same than the .19, except that there is now a folder GameData>Squad with all the stocks parts.

I left all the other folders concerning the mod as they were on.19

Everything seems to run perfectly, even the mods not updated for .20, Except Subassembly loader and Romfarer that I removed.

Is that the way it should be, or do we have to change those folders concerning mods and put them in a mod folder?
